NK041(di)049:1: // snga 'gyur bstan pa rgyas pa'i smon lam chos rgyal dgyes pa'i zhal lung zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK041(di)049:2: snga 'gyur bstan pa rgyas pa'i smon lam chos rgyal dgyes pa'i zhal lung zhes bya ba /
NK041(di)049:3: de yang dus kyi tha mar rtsa gsum lha yi
NK041(di)049:4: thugs rgyud bskul nas bstan pa'i snying po rin po
NK041(di)049:5: che rgyas par gyur cig snyam du lan gcig tsam
NK041(di)049:6: mos pa yang bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan
NK041(di)049:7: cing / rgyal ba'i sras kyi smon lam yongs su
NK041(di)049:8: rdzogs nas skye ba kun tu rgyal ba'i chos dang
NK041(di)049:9: chos kyi snying po zab mo'i theg pa dang 'phrad
NK041(di)049:10: nas 'dzin skyong spel bas myur du rnam pa thams
NK041(di)049:11: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la reg par 'gyur ba'i
NK041(di)049:13: skal bzang rnams kyis dus dus dang /
NK041(di)049:14: khyad par tshogs mang gi skabs su 'di ltar smon lam gdab par bya ste /
NK041(di)049:16: phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas //
NK041(di)049:17: khyad par mnyam med sh+aakya'i rgyal po dang //
NK041(di)049:18: rgyal sras brgyad dang gnas brtan 'phags pa'i tshogs //
NK041(di)049:19: mkhyen brtse'i bdag nyid mchog rnams dgongs su gsol //
NK041(di)049:20: phan bde'i 'byung gnas bstan pa rin po che //
NK041(di)049:21: ston dang sems dpa' 'phags pa mchog rnams kyis //
NK041(di)049:22: yang yang dka' bas btsal zhing brnag pa'i don //
NK041(di)049:23: mtsho skyes rgyal ba'i bstan pa rgyas gyur cig /
NK041(di)049:24: mkhan slob chos rgyal sprul pa'i lo pan dang //
NK041(di)049:25: bka' gter rig 'dzin brgyud pa yi dam lha //
NK041(di)049:26: ma mgon gza' rdor rgyud gsum dregs pa'i tshogs //
NK041(di)049:27: snga 'gyur rtsa gsum lha tshogs dgongs su gsol //
NK041(di)049:28: thub bstan mdo dang sngags kyi tshul mtha' dag /
NK041(di)049:29: gangs can ljongs su brtse bas drangs gyur pa //
NK041(di)049:30: ches cher spel ba'i rdo rje'i dam dgongs nas //
NK041(di)049:31: mtsho skyes rgyal ba'i phyogs dus rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje //
NK041(di)049:32: rigs gsum sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul rol mo yis //
NK041(di)049:33: gangs can phan bde'i nyi ma gsal bar mdzad //
NK041(di)049:34: mtsho skyes rgyal dang rgyal sras 'phags pa chen po'i tshogs //
NK041(di)049:35: bsam bzhin sprul pa'i zlos gar nyer bzung nas //
NK041(di)049:36: dri med rgyal bstan nor bu'i rgyal mtshan sgreng //
NK041(di)049:37: mtsho skyes thun mong thun min gzhung kun rang dbang gis //
NK041(di)049:38: ma nor bsgyur zhus gtan la phab pa yis //
NK041(di)049:39: gangs ljongs snang ba'i sgo chen thog mar phyes //
NK041(di)049:40: mtsho skyes skal bzang gdul byas mdo dang sngags kyi tshul //
NK041(di)049:41: nyams su len la gzhan dring mi 'jog par //
NK041(di)049:42: bka' dang dgongs pa 'grel ba'i gzhung kun rdzogs //
NK041(di)049:43: mtsho skyes bden gsung bka' yi rgya mtsho chen po la //
NK041(di)049:44: zab mo'i chos gter nor bus mngon par mdzes //
NK041(di)049:45: mdo dang sngags kyi lam bzang zung du 'brel //
NK041(di)049:46: mtsho skyes rmad byung za hor mkhan po'i spyod pa dang //
NK041(di)049:47: mtshungs med dpal ldan klu yi lta ba gnyis //
NK041(di)049:48: zung 'brel brgyud pa'i bka' srol phyag rgyas btab //
NK041(di)049:49: mtsho skyes zab mo'i nang rgyud sde gsum dgongs pa'i bcud //
NK041(di)049:50: thun min man ngag gsang ba'i lam mchog nas //
NK041(di)049:51: 'ja' lus chos skur gshegs pa'i ngo mtshar 'bar //
NK041(di)049:52: mtsho skyes rab 'byams zhi khro'i khyab bdag sgrub sde brgyad //
NK041(di)049:53: bka' bab rig 'dzin so so'i dgongs bcud dang //
NK041(di)049:54: kun 'dus pad+ma'i bka' srol gcig tu 'khyil //
NK041(di)049:55: mtsho skyes rgyu dang 'bras bu gsang sngags theg pa che //
NK041(di)049:56: tshang la ma nor rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i lung //
NK041(di)049:57: d+aa ki'i zhal gyi drod rlangs tho le ba //
NK041(di)049:58: mtsho skyes rdo rje 'chang gi dgongs don bdud rtsi'i bcud //
NK041(di)049:59: mkhas grub bye ba'i zhal nas snyan du brgyud //
NK041(di)049:60: rtog ge ngan pa'i rang bzos ma bslad pa //
NK041(di)049:61: mtsho skyes gser zhing nor bu'i spras pa'i yon gyis kyang //
NK041(di)049:62: mi 'gugs dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro'i thugs mdzod chos //
NK041(di)049:63: brtse bas rjes 'jug skal pa kho nar bkram //
NK041(di)049:64: mtsho skyes ngo bo ka nas dag pa'i ye shes la //
NK041(di)049:65: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gdangs shar bas //
NK041(di)049:66: blun sgom sems las 'das pa'i rdzogs pa che //
NK041(di)049:67: mtsho skyes yod med phyogs rer zhen pa'i dmigs gtad zhig /
NK041(di)049:68: mthar 'dzin lta ba'i 'dzin stangs drung nas phyung //
NK041(di)049:69: gzhi lam 'bras bu snang stong zung du 'jug /
NK041(di)049:70: mtsho skyes dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mthar thug don //
NK041(di)049:71: zab zhi spros bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas //
NK041(di)049:72: rig stong mi shigs rdo rje grub pa'i mtha' //
NK041(di)049:73: mtsho skyes mang du thos pa lung gi sprin 'khrigs shing //
NK041(di)049:74: pha rol rgol 'joms rig pa'i glog phreng 'bar //
NK041(di)049:75: man ngag gnad kyi bdud rtsi snying la sim //
NK041(di)049:76: mtsho skyes rmad byung a ti yo ga'i gseng lam nas //
NK041(di)049:77: ma lus rgyal ba kun gyi ye shes sku //
NK041(di)049:78: khyab bdag 'jam dpal rdo rjer rab bsgrubs pa //
NK041(di)049:79: mtsho skyes yang dag tshad ma gsum gyi nga ro yis //
NK041(di)049:80: lta dman ri dwags tshogs rnams skrag mdzad pa //
NK041(di)049:81: theg mchog seng ge'i sgra dbyangs sa gsum khyab //
NK041(di)049:82: mtsho skyes rgyal bstan yongs su rdzogs pa'i gos bzang rtser //
NK041(di)049:83: 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i tog mdzes pa //
NK041(di)049:84: phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan mtho //
NK041(di)049:85: mtsho skyes bdag sogs deng nas 'gro ba ji srid du //
NK041(di)049:86: bstan dang bstan pa'i snying po yongs rdzogs pa //
NK041(di)049:87: mkha' khyab zhing du 'dzin skyong spel ba yis //
NK041(di)049:88: mtsho skyes mdor na mkhas btsun grub pa'i rnam thar gyis //
NK041(di)049:89: rgyal bstan spel ba'i phrin las mkha' khyab pa'i //
NK041(di)049:90: bstan 'dzin dam pas sa steng yongs gang nas //
NK041(di)049:91: mtsho skyes dpal ldan bla ma'i sku tshe rab brtan cing //
NK041(di)049:92: bstan pa'i sbyin bdag mnga' thang dar ba yis //
NK041(di)049:93: chos srid mi nub nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsgrengs //
NK041(di)049:94: mtsho skyes rgyal ba'i bstan pa rgyas gyur cig /
NK041(di)049:95: ces rgyal ba thams cad kyi ngo bo dpal ldan
NK041(di)049:96: sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes 'chi med mtshor 'khrungs rgyal ba'i
NK041(di)049:97: bstan pa snga 'gyur rnying ma zhes grags pa 'di
NK041(di)049:98: ni rgyal bstan yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyi mo yin
NK041(di)049:99: cing zab gnad che ba du ma'i khyad chos dang
NK041(di)049:100: / lta sgom rnam par dag pa rgyal ba dgyes
NK041(di)049:101: pa'i lam bzang ma nor ba yin pa 'di ngo
NK041(di)049:102: shes nas nor bu rin po che byi dor byas
NK041(di)049:103: te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse la mchod pa bzhin du
NK041(di)049:104: gang zag skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis 'chad
NK041(di)049:105: rtsod rtsom gsum gyi phrin las rlabs po ches phyogs
NK041(di)049:106: thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par mdzad pa'i thugs
NK041(di)049:108: de lta bu'i bzhed pa yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i
NK041(di)049:109: rten 'brel smon tshig tu rnying bstan la lhag bsam
NK041(di)049:110: rnam par dkar ba mi pham 'jam dbyangs rnam rgyal
NK041(di)049:111: rgya mtshos gnas dus rten 'brel dge bar gung thun
